snippet.title: MonsterBlast Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
It´s all about blasting Monsters. On randomly generated maps you shoot your way through the action to find the exit and move on to the next level.

Lots of monsters and nasty bosses make your work difficult. Collect monster energy to get special weapons. Find boxes with special items to improve your health, Use support items that help you blast more monsters.

Increase your experience from map to map and improve your health, firepower and luck. So you can get harder monster and find better items.

4 different worlds with 6 challenging levels each, allow you a few hours of challenging shooting fun.

www.entwickler-x.de/monster-blast
2020 - EntwicklerX

More games:
www.entwickler-x.de

Music: melodyloops.com
